synopsis.text:
Lupin, the cunning thief, finds himself in a high-stakes race against time as he pursues the elusive Celestial Crystals. His quest takes an unexpected turn when he crosses paths with Pycal, a magician from his past who was believed to be dead. Despite surviving a fiery encounter and a plunge down a waterfall, courtesy of Lupin, Pycal's thirst for vengeance remains unquenched.

As the two adversaries converge in Greece, the stakes are raised with six of the seven crystals already in their possession. However, Pycal holds a dangerous advantage - he has unraveled the secret power hidden within the crystals and is eager to wield it against Lupin. With the odds stacked against him, can Lupin outwit his vengeful foe and claim the final crystal before it's too late? The thrilling chase unfolds in this enthralling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
